categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Aurek Company was a company in the Second Battalion of the Fifth Infantry, a division in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. It was stationed with Besh and Cresh Companies on Balmorra, where the entire battalion was under the command of Major Tyrus, and the three companies were tasked with fighting the Balmorran resistance in the Broken Valley.
